text: what can I do about my deploy transactions taking a very long time? like minutes. this seems to be increasing over time as i deploy over and over - Is there something I should be resetting every few times I redeploy, like a cache? should I be deleting old docker images regularly?
hmm - well deleting container instances and images would probably help somewhat
where are you deploying to? maybe its a far away server? is the docker endpoint running locally or in a different host?

My buddy <@U2J8FABS9> wrote this awesome post on how to deploy a Fabric Blockchain with brooklyn! <https://medium.com/think-consortium-on-blockchain/building-a-permissioned-blockchain-pt-1-8ebab9e68582#.n7uf4hg92>

attachments.title: Building a Permissioned Blockchain Pt 1: – Think Consortium on Blockchain
attachments.text: Deploying Hyperledger Fabric Cluster with Apache Brooklyn.
